actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy

official_title: A bill to direct the Attorney General to study the problems of indigent, elderly immigrants who wish to return to their home countries but cannot afford to pay the transportation costs to do so.

summary.text: Immigrant Repatriation Study Act - Directs the Attorney General to study the problem of indigent, elderly immigrants who wish to return to their home countries but cannot afford the transportation costs to do so. Requires a report to Congress within 12 months.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Attorney General to study the problems of indigent, elderly immigrants who wish to return to their home countries but cannot afford to pay the transportation costs to do so.
